articles.content: Classic Legends, the brand that owns Jawa and Yezdi, announced that it delivered 500 units of its motorcycles in Maharashtra on the occasion of Gudi Padwa - the Marathi new year. Classic Legends comm… [+1273 chars]

articles.title: Vodafone Idea introduces two new prepaid plans with 30 days and 31 days validity - India Today
articles.description: After Reliance Jio and Airtel, telecom operator Vodafone Idea has now introduced prepaid plans with a validity of 30 and 31 days.

articles.title: "For Rs 1,400 Crore, Amazon Has Destroyed Rs 26,000-Crore Company": Future - NDTV Profit
articles.description: Future Retail told the Supreme Court that "Amazon wanted to destroy us and it succeeded," as the bitter and long-running legal battle continues, with the next hearing scheduled for April 4.
